channel.title: index on jas/text
channel.description: Recent content in index on jas/text

item.title: dreamless
item.description: sat he, dreamless ambition free, fearless from a couch in the city no one to impress his days whittle away under hazy smoke sway inevitably underdress’d distressed depressed test-less yet content at the bottom of a wish-less well, who’s to say who’s to tell if tomorrow sparrow song floats along dawn amber breeze, through reeds and trees into the cracks in the window-sill seams carrying the mem’ry of a dream

item.title: Lit Study
item.description: I am meant to be writing some report on the literature in the field of computer science, with specialization in programming language theory. There are many things that I could potentially write on, but the particularities of the subject are yet unclear (I should have buckled-down on this two weeks ago, but it’s fiiine) My supervisor presented me with a couple conferences (ICFP, PLDI) wherein I should find some inspiration for papers to read and report

item.title: Limerick 1
item.description: It was lovely as love could be Only alone, you with me 'Til one day I saw Into life's gaping maw And ran away across the sea

item.title: In the Beginning*
item.description: *Well not really the beginning This is a post overdue, to a blog I should have started a while ago, if not to achieve anything other than a “I could so I did” thing. After multiple failed attempts using blogger, wordpress, et al. I stopped because I didn’t really like the workflow. 1 So I’m not one to bear the burden of a over-heavy work-flow, if it should take much work to spew my words into the void I likely
